text: @concit1USA I am happy that true patriots in WWII said, "I will sacrifice my life for your safety, the safety of the American people." #GreatestGeneration is one of many groups & people we are protecting now. #StayAtHome #COVID19 #reopening #WearAMask #StayAtHomeSaveLives @GavinNewsom
